title: GeoSCOPE: Geographic Spatial Clustering for Observing Provider Equity
description: A full-stack dashboard for an HHS project to coordinate and distribute therapeutic products across the US, processing and visualizing millions of data points.

title: Note.AI - GenAI Study Tool
description: A web app using Generative AI to create multiple-choice questions from user-uploaded notes, deployed on AWS and built with Svelte.js and Django.

title: Deep Learning for Cancer Detection
description: Designed a CNN for semantic segmentation of breast cancer PET scans. Wrote a data pipeline for 10,000+ images and achieved 98% accuracy.
